title: Papaya mousse

default: 150ml/5fl oz double cream, whipped until stiff
100g/3½oz papaya, peeled, seeds removed and finely chopped
1 tbsp papaya, cut into small cubes, to garnish

steps: Place the cream, chopped papaya and one tablespoon of honey into a bowl and fold together.
Place an oiled 5cm/2in chefs' ring into the centre of a plate and spoon in some of the mixture.
To serve, remove the chefs' ring, drizzle over the remaining tablespoon of honey and garnish with the papaya cubes on top.
